entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Embrace spans in System.Reflection.Metadata. #85280
  • [Documentation] Request update on the documentation of IL2026 #85274
  • IServiceCollection Configure should have an overload taking Func<TOptions> #85276
  • outerloop-nightly is broken because "native test components" is unavailable #85263
  • jitstress-random ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled is failing #85262
  • jitstress: BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd failing #85261
  • JitStress: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.UseAfterDispose(importKey: False) #85260
  • [8.0.100-preview.4.23223.1] IEnumerable<T>.Current throw System.InvalidOperationException when IEnumerable<T> collection is empty #85243
  • Function pointer type handles in shared code don't work #85240
    8.0.0
  • PATH=~/cmake/bin:$PATH ./build.sh clr+libs -c Release failed #85236
  • Test failure Interop\\MarshalAPI\\IUnknown\\IUnknownTest\\IUnknownTest.cmd #85234
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #85233
    Future
  • SEHException (0x80004005): External component has thrown an exception #85231

Closed

  • NuGet ILAsm V5.0.0 /res: support is missing #48046
    Future
  • ILDasm crashes when dumping statistics for an invalid module #9668
    Future
  • Unnecessary LdelemaRef call not elided with Volatile.Read #65789
    8.0.0
  • PublishSingleFile=true + EventListener causes EventPipeEventDispatcher.DispatchEventsToEventListeners() to fully occupy a CPU core #80064
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Failing test ApplyUpdateTests.AsyncMethodChanges #79043
    8.0.0
  • [android] .NET 8 performance regression in System.Reflection.MethodInfo/ConstructorInfo.Invoke() #83893
    8.0.0
  • The JIT isn't optimizing `>>>` in the same way as `Vector128.ShiftRightLogical` on ARM #85257
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce TimeProvider extension method to create a CTS to be cancelled after a specified time period. #85080
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Hot Reload: Add support for updating generic methods #82791
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Hot reload: Add support for editing members of generic types #82792
    8.0.0
  • Optimizing a runtime-generated constant value #84094
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #78512
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Tune CSE/Constant propagation to fix this SIMD example #70657
    8.0.0
  • Requires on NativeAOT has problems with CompilerGeneratedCode #68786
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce Requires warnings in Generics #68688
    8.0.0
  • WASI app always tries to load icudt.dat from disk #84310
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows nuget package has latest version 6.0.0-preview.5.21301.5 (last updated 15.06.2021) #85237

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Add Android BenchmarkDotNet test #85282
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose various Convert intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512DQ #85281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable Windows Arm64 ASMDIFFS between checked and release build #85279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix test execution jobs in the coreclr-release-outerloop-nightly pipeline #85278
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix perf regressions in Utf8Formatter for integers #85277
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix Avx2 helpers #85275
    needs-area-label
  • Build Mono LLVM legs on the CBL-Mariner images, but run the AOTing steps on CentOS Stream 8 with binutils #85273
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix edge case in stack overflow handling #85272
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging][native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85271
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85270
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.x
  • EnC Support for Generics #85269
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the TimeProvider test #85268
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: improve profile update for loop inversion #85265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Add metadata update for overrides (backport #85182) #85259
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono
  • [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85255
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • A bit faster version of indexing. WIP #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] Remove mono_dl_open_runtime_lib() #85253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Allow spill-at-single-def for pure defs #85251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests for local aliasing on Mono Interpreter #85250
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Directory.Build.props: restore previous behavior when targetting 'other' TargetOSes from Windows. #85246
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Introduce GT_JTEST and clean up GT_JCMP flags #85242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add aligned attribute for g_SyncBlockCacheInstance to avoid unaligned accessing error on some CPUs. #85241
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: fix race condition in when creating native wrapper #85235
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fixed regressions for `GT_NEG` containment #85230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Pass resource item to workload task #85264
    needs-area-label
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • JIT: Move some BasicBlock methods into block.cpp #85224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use double VectorTableLookup on ARM in ProbabilisticMap #85189
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Skip covariant checks for ldelema T[] with T exact #85256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Enable threads in Wasm SDK #85109
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add metadata update for overrides #85182
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Optimize >>> to ShiftRightLogical on arm64 #85258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Remove pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui Mobile #85074
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #84735
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono
  • Adding TimeProvider CreateCancellationTokenSource extension method #85131
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix superpmi.py to not cache local MCH files #85187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512 variants of AVX, AVX2, and FMA instructions #85228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeouts #85167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd saturating integer arith. #85043
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] remove unneeded PKG_CONFIG_PATH for FreeBSD #84062
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove unused code for PBKDF2 on Android #83639
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Special-case enums in Utf8.TryWrite handler #85196
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging][wasm][debugger] Remove error message when browser is closed #85062
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.18
  • Use emit-based invoke for all of WASM including DI #85065
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono] refactor metadata update code #85177
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove common tests from the Roslyn3.11 test project. #85165
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix compiling errors within LoongArch64 and RISCV64 for `ins_Move_Extend`. #85216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] fix the assertion error: 'numPlacedArgLocals < ArrLen(placedArgLocals)'. #85238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Skip libs native runtime packages build in source-index-stage job #85239
    needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] fix the errors for mod/div after #82924. #85140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ECMA-335 for function pointer changes #84962
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 and riscv64 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Parallel.ForAsync #84804
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add parsing error information to composite format string parsing exceptions #85106
    area-System.Runtime
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325

  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191

  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183

  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984

  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756

  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
